short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protects your credentials from fake login and registration forms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The SafeLogins extension helps you avoid theft of your logins and passwords from popular sites. When a new page is opened in the browser, it is checked against our databases.
If the page url or domain is in our database, then you will receive a notification with a warning that will help you be more careful about where exactly you enter your logins and passwords.
You can also manually request to check the current page by clicking on the extension icon.
